text:
+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #39313 +++

The cloned bug demonstrates that this is not necessarily the expected behavior.

Thanks,
David

(In reply to comment #0)
> The cloned bug demonstrates that this is not necessarily the expected behavior.

Perhaps I should say instead that it would be helpful in avoiding certain configuration problems to make clear how the inheritance works.
